#Allometry analyses

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
#@param x= coordinates after gpa incl centroid size, e.g. land_data$cranium. "procrustes" of land_data contains all the objects of gpagen
allom.shape<-function (procrustes_coordinate_file_with_centroid_size){

  Allometry <- procD.allometry((procrustes_coordinate_file_with_centroid_size$coords)~ procrustes_coordinate_file_with_centroid_size$Csize, f2=NULL, f3=NULL, logsz = FALSE, iter=999)
  return(Allometry)
  }
allom.shape(land_data$cranium$procrustes)
summary(Allometry)

coords=land_data$cranium$procrustes$coords
Csize=land_data$cranium$procrustes$Csize

Allometry <- procD.allometry(coords~ Csize)
summary(Allometry)


```
